page.title: 05LEISURE TIME
page.content: Many leisure time activities revolve around the{Community Centre}and the{ {churches. MARK (age 11)- Every Tuesday at 5.30pm I go to the{Taekwondo Club}at the Community Centre where our instructor is Miss Anderton. We warm up until the whole class is there, then we practice kicks and punches. STUART (age 11)- On Mondays at 5.00 p.m. I go to the Community Centre {Football Club}for training. At half time we have a drink. We each pay 10p towards the electricity bill. CAROLINE & NATALIE (ages 11)- We belong to a{Morris Dancing Troupe. Every Tuesday from 6.30 to 8.00 p.m. the Crickettes, as we are called, practice at the Community Centre. At weekends we often dance and march at carnivals.
